title: Terms of Service for Transportation
text: 1. The FixDrive service provides an information platform for searching, ordering, and paying for transportation services between users and drivers. 2. The user agrees to use the service only for lawful purposes, not to violate the rights of third parties, and not to use the service for spam, fraud, or transporting prohibited items. 3. All payments are made through the app at current rates. 4. The service may change the terms of service, rates, and app functionality without prior notice. 5. In case of violation of the terms, the service may restrict or block user access. 6. All disputes are resolved in accordance with the applicable law of the country where the service is provided. 7. The user agrees to the processing of personal data in accordance with the privacy policy.
